plot: American chef Julia Child and French chef Jacques Pepin host this cooking show that shows viewers how to best prepare various French and American dishes.
plot_en: American chef Julia Child and French chef Jacques Pepin host this cooking show that shows viewers how to best prepare various French and American dishes.
plot_es: American chef Julia Child and French chef Jacques Pepin host this cooking show that shows viewers how to best prepare various French and American dishes.
title: Julia & Jacques Cooking at Home
